name: RecruitDifferently
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Please add this skill to your Flash Briefing! Each week, we'll provide you with short but impactful thoughts on the topic of recruitment and talent acquisition. Each flash briefing will highlight a unique or innovative look at some aspect of talent acquisition. Topics might include sourcing, employment branding, assessment strategies, recruitment marketing, recruitment technology and more!

The weekly topics come from the www.RecruitDifferently.com blog and other innovative sources from around the web.

This skill was designed to be added to your list of "Flash Briefing" content.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
